thread.title: Shop the Look: Monochrome Apartment Decor
thread.title_full: Shop the Look: Monochrome Apartment Decor - Vogue

author: Madeleine Luckel
title: Shop the Look: Monochrome Apartment Decor
text:
A modern home is often assumed to be hip, minimalist—but without much glamour. However, form can follow function while including red upholstery, purple velvets, and the high-carat sparkle of the New York City skyline. In one shot from “Interior Lives,” the October issue’s spread featuring model Caroline Trentini , interior design firm Doug Meyer Studio proved just that. Above, we’ve collected the best mirrored and mod products for home—inspired by (and directly from) the image.
Vogue may earn compensation on these sales through affiliate programs.
